Bsiness Setup in Sharjah Airport International
Free Zone (SAIF)

Prices starting fromAED 5,750

Sharjah Airport International Free Zone – excellent free zone to start your business venture, exciting business incentives that include speed of service and simplicity of setup process! SAIF zone provides a wide range of business opportunities for start-ups and other business entities. We are experts when it comes to business setup in SAIF Zone, and have been of assistance to several clients.

Sharjah airport international free zone is a versatile business destination ranging from single office space to huge manufacturing facilities. The free zone is specifically designed to accommodate every business. SAIF assures a trouble-free working environment with state of the art facilities.

Just like any other government, UAE requires few documentation and approvals for business setup. We at A&A Associate, support your business setup in Sharjah free zone with a successful track record of company formation.

Why Choose A&A Associate LLC?

We have a team of professional experts who are committed to deliver world-class business setup solutions in UAE.

SAIF zone’s customer base is considered as one of the dynamic option for entrepreneurs. Start your company in the world’s prestigious free zone with A&A Associate.

We are specialists in providing unique business setup in dubai that fits your business needs.

Get ready to open your business in SAIF zone with quick, reliable, and expert advice!

  • JAFZA
  • DMCC

Why SAIF zone is a good choice for your business setup in UAE?

  • Complete ownership, repatriation of profits, easy transfer of funds, and other competitive tax-free advantages.
  • Facilities for manufacturing, packaging, assembling, import, export, trade, and other value-added services.
  • Warehouses, storage, office space, and more at low cost
  • Fast processing of relevant licenses ( trade, professional, and industrial)
  • Visa sponsorship for employees and investors
  • Low cost energy and labor
  • Budget-friendly accommodation for in-site workforce
  • Legal services
  • Land on lease
  • Industrial park
  • Basic facilities like clinic, transportation, travel agency, petrol station, restaurants, banks, etc.
  • Security services

What are the licenses available in SAIF zone?

SAIF zone provides three major licenses and they are,
  • Trading
Trading license can be obtained under a commercial license which allows a large number of trading activities.
  • Service
This allows an entrepreneur to carry out services specified in the license. All the services are allowed unless it’s restricted by the federal or local authorities.
  • Industrial
This includes import of raw materials, processing, assembling, packaging, and finally, exporting the finished product.

You can apply for any of the licenses mentioned. It is also possible to combine multiple business activities under one license. For more information, it is strongly recommended that you seek the professional advice of someone experienced in matters of business setup in Sharjah free zone.

What are the Documents Required for Business Setup in SAIF Zone?

SAIF zone business license is issued instantly on the day of application. The documents required include,

  • Passport size photo
  • Passport
  • Email, phone number, and residential address of the owner

After company registration, SAIF zone will issue the following documents

  • License
  • Certificate of incorporation
  • MOA
  • Share certificate
  • Investment service agreement

A&A Associate business setup consultants in UAE ensure fast and instant company registration in SAIF zone.

What are the steps for Business Setup in SAIF Zone?

SAIF zone company formation is a seamless process with business setup consultants. Start your business with the following steps,

  • Submit the application form to DED Sharjah or specific free zone
  • Prepare company’s MoA, and resolution from shareholder
  • Submit supporting documents and make the license payment
  • Get the trade license from concerned authorities
  • Apply for company establishment card
  • Apply for resident visa and employee visa
  • Open your bank account and get all the other clearances

Business facilities in SAIF-ZONE

Sharjah Airport International Freezone is one of the most lucrative business locations where individuals can set up their business in any industry or sector. It is designed for maximum profit to the individuals.
